web-app.description: Service Manager Control Panel by AIRO Tech OMD, Inc.

context-param.description: The actual title of the program.
The actual name of the web app.
The URL path to the 'images' folder.
The URL path to the folder that will hold temporary barcode images to be displayed on web pages when printing UPC bar codes
The absolute path to the folder that will hold temporary barcode images to be displayed on web pages when printing UPC bar codes
The path to the 'scripts' folder, which contains javascript, etc.
The path to the 'local resources' folder, which contains files specific to the local company
The path to a folder to hold temporary files for printing, etc.
The maximum number of database connections that this web app will allow to be opened
'True' (do not include the single quotes) to cause the program to log every database update to a work order (for diagnostic purposes). Anything other than 'True' turns off that logging.
Identifies the URL of the page that contains all of the documentation for the function descriptions of SMCP
